top_questions.text: Define virtual reality. Write any two areas where virtual reality is used.​
What is looping?​ f) List any two data types used in C-programming language.

What is password? Write any two importance of password protection.​ f) What is DBMS? Write four objects of MS-Access.​ g) What are validation text and validation rule?​ h) What is form? Write any two advantages of it.​ i) What is record? Why is primary key necessary in record?
